item.title: Sum-Product Network Optimization
item.description: This is my master thesis project. The goal of this project is to optimize the existing implementation of the machine learning model Sum-Product Network in order to make faster and efficient learning.

item.title: Twitter Hate Speech Recognition
item.description: The goal of this project is to create a model to identify the tweets that push hate.

item.title: Animal Recognition
item.description: This project is a group project and it has been developed for the exam of Digital Signal & Image processing.

item.title: Boston Crime Analysis
item.description: This is my bachelor thesis project. The goal of this project is develop an association algorithm that finds probability rules between different kind of spatio-temporal events, like criminal events.
